lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Nina Persson/Peter Svensson
[00:00.176] 作曲 : Nina Persson/Peter Svensson
[00:00.353]Love me, love me, say that you love me
[00:03.906]Fool me, fool me, go on and fool me
[00:07.929]Dear, I fear we're facing a problem
[00:12.187]You love me no longer, I know and
[00:15.739]Maybe there is nothing that I can do
[00:20.572]To make you do
[00:23.550]Mama tells me I shouldn't bother
[00:27.808]That I ought to stick to another man
[00:32.196]A man that surely deserves me
[00:36.036]But I think you do
[00:38.884]So I cry and I pray and I beg
[00:41.809]For you to
[00:43.011]Love me, love me, say that you love me
[00:46.851]Fool me, fool me, go on and fool me
[00:50.769]Love me, love me, pretend that you love me
[00:54.609]Leave me, leave me, just say that you need me
[00:58.606]Love me, love me
[01:02.707]Fool me, fool me
[01:06.338]Love me, love me
[01:10.466]Fool me, fool me
[01:14.384]Lately I have desperately pondered
[01:18.433]Spent my nights awake and I wonder
[01:22.064]What I could have done in another way
[01:26.818]To make you stay
[01:29.979]Reason will not reach a solution
[01:34.080]I will end up lost in confusion
[01:37.659]I don't care if you really care
[01:41.630]As long as you don't go
[01:45.418]So I cry and I pray and I beg
[01:48.187]For you to
[01:49.362]Love me, love me, say that you love me
[01:53.176]Fool me, fool me, go on and fool me
[01:57.068]Love me, love me, pretend that you love me
[02:00.960]Leave me, leave me, just say that you need me
[02:04.931]Love me, love me
[02:09.058]Fool me, fool me
[02:12.924]Love me, love me
[02:16.712]Fool me, fool me
[02:20.004]Oh I cry and I pray and I beg
[02:26.064]For you to love me
[02:28.337]I cry and I pray and I beg
[02:33.849]For you to love me
[02:36.304]Love me, love me
[02:40.144]Fool me, fool me
[02:43.880]Love me, love me
[02:47.955]Love me, love me, say that you love me
[02:51.769]Love me, love me (For you to love me)
[02:55.713]Fool me, fool me (For you to love me)
[02:59.605]Love me, love me (For you to love me)
[03:03.471]Love me, love me, say that you love me
tlyric:
[by:BLINDJOY]
[00:00.353]爱我，爱我，说你爱我
[00:03.906]愚弄我，愚弄我，继续愚弄我
[00:07.929]亲爱的，恐怕我们正面临着一个问题
[00:12.187]你不再爱我，我已知晓
[00:15.739]也许我对此束手无策
[00:20.572]要让你这样做
[00:23.550]妈妈告诉我不应再为此困扰
[00:27.808]我该去爱上另一个人
[00:32.196]一个确实配得上我的人
[00:36.036]但我认为你就是
[00:38.884]所以我哭泣祈祷又乞求
[00:41.809]为了让你
[00:43.011]爱我，爱我，说你爱我
[00:46.851]愚弄我，愚弄我，继续愚弄我
[00:50.769]爱我，爱我，假装你爱我
[00:54.609]离开我，离开我，仅说一句你需要我
[00:58.606]爱我，爱我
[01:02.707]愚弄我，愚弄我
[01:06.338]爱我，爱我
[01:10.466]愚弄我，愚弄我
[01:14.384]最近我拼命地琢磨
[01:18.433]彻夜不眠，我想要知道
[01:22.064]我原本可以用另一种方式做些什么
[01:26.818]来让你留下
[01:29.979]理智无法解答疑难
[01:34.080]我终将迷失在困惑里
[01:37.659]我不在乎你是否真正关心我
[01:41.630]只要你不走
[01:45.418]所以我哭泣祈祷又乞求
[01:48.187]为了让你
[01:49.362]爱我，爱我，说你爱我
[01:53.176]愚弄我，愚弄我，继续愚弄我
[01:57.068]爱我，爱我，假装你爱我
[02:00.960]留下我，留下我，仅说一句你需要我
[02:04.931]爱我，爱我
[02:09.058]愚弄我，愚弄我
[02:12.924]爱我，爱我
[02:16.712]愚弄我，愚弄我
[02:20.004]哦 我哭泣祈祷又乞求
[02:26.064]为了让你爱我
[02:28.337]我哭泣祈祷又乞求
[02:33.849]为了让你爱我
[02:36.304]爱我，爱我
[02:40.144]愚弄我，愚弄我
[02:43.880]爱我，爱我
[02:47.955]爱我，爱我，说你爱我
[02:51.769]爱我，爱我（为了让你爱我）
[02:55.713]（为了让你爱我）
[02:59.605]（为了让你爱我）
[03:03.471]爱我，爱我，说你爱我
